pkgmetadata.longdescription: fab===A fabulous, lightweight wrapper around Phabricator's API, Conduit, to handleauthentication and other annoying things.Usage-----.. code:: python import phabricator phab = phabricator.Phabricator('https://...', 'Username', token='api-token') phab.request('user.whoami')License-------Copyright 2014, 2018, 2020-2021 Kunal Mehta, under the LGPL v3 or later. See COPYING for moredetails.
